Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor, Duke O'Dowd, and sets up the initial mystery involving suspicious characters and underwater intrigue.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Page Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The cover page of 'Champ Comics' introduces the Human Meteor in an underwater setting, hinting at his powers and a looming conflict with divers.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, picks up suspicious passengers and notices he is being followed, setting up suspense and foreshadowing his transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's First Confrontation and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the sedan occupants, leading to a fight and his subsequent hospitalization, where he learns about a potential yacht-related conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Hidden Observer
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to stow away on the suspicious yacht, while a hidden observer watches, adding layers of intrigue and parallel actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the events unfolding on the yacht 'Marlin', including Pete/Toby's investigation, his discovery of a Japanese submarine plot, and the involvement of Namor.

sub_scenes.title: Pete's Yacht Deck and Cabin Intrusion
sub_scenes.description: Pete, working on the yacht, becomes suspicious and investigates a cabin, leading to a startling discovery and violent ejection.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Underwater Mission and Submarine Plot Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Toby, revealed to be Pete, receives mission orders, dives underwater, and uncovers a Japanese submarine resupply operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight, Submarine Escape, and Namor's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Toby gets into a fight with enemy divers while their submarine attempts to escape. Tentacles intervene, leading to Namor's dramatic entry and attack on the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Ship's Crew Alarm and Namor's Surface Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The ship's crew reacts to Peter's death and the geyser caused by Namor's attack, while Namor surfaces to investigate the yacht and Peter's role.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Pursuit of the Ship and Need for Air
Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death
Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Departure, Hospital Recovery, and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Namor and Toby urgently depart, visit the hospital for recovery updates, and then head home, concluding their immediate mission.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads and their fight against a Nazi spy ring, involving an ambulance, a garage, and a confrontation with Major Bronson and Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads engage in combat with Nazi fiends, while two boys observe an ambulance arriving, setting up separate but connected storylines.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies
Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a garage, where they observe suspicious activity involving a marine and a civilian.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address
The Marine Salute and Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Mr. Horst's Threat
sub_scenes.description: The boys are approached by a police officer at the garage, led inside, and abruptly confronted by the menacing Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage
Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Carbon Monoxide Plot, and Bronson's Trap
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet, while Major Bronson proposes a carbon monoxide murder plot, setting a sinister tone.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Gun Threat, and Horst's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: The boys are chased and captured, Bronson threatens them with a gun, but Horst unexpectedly betrays Bronson, leading to chaos and escape for the boys.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help, Sabotage Plan Discovery, and Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: The boys escape and seek help, discovering sabotage plans which leads to a Nazi attack on the Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Defense and Marine Counter-Attack
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself during the attack, leading to a confrontation and the arrival of Marines to counter-attack.

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Champ and Henry in South America, where they are ambushed, reach a town, and get entangled in a kidnapping mystery involving President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are ambushed in a desert landscape but manage to reach a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogation and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers confront and interrogate Champ and Henry, questioning them about President Rosita's daughter, with a flashback to a previous confusing encounter.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Continued Interrogation, and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Champ attempts escape, but interrogation continues, revealing Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre and the reason for the army's actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul
Explanation: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Abduction, Mistaken Identity, and Rescue Mission Plan
sub_scenes.description: Two men discussing El Tigre are abducted and taken to Mama, who mistakes them for rescuers of Rosita, leading to a plan to find El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration, Diversion, and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: The group infiltrates El Tigre's hideout using a diversion, leading to a direct confrontation with El Tigre himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and Sock Attack

sub_scenes.title: Garbage Argument, Barrel Rest, and Rosita Search
sub_scenes.description: Brief scenes of an argument, a man in a barrel, and the continued search for Rosita within El Tigre's hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, El Tigre's Concern, and Rosita's Location Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation for Rosita's location, El Tigre's separate concern about name misuse, and finally, news of Rosita's location.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse

sub_scenes.title: Immediate Rescue Mission and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre orders an immediate rescue mission for Rosita, leading to a horseback pursuit of Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Infiltration and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Forced entry and hotel infiltration, culminating in Rosita's rescue amidst ongoing combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Combat and Rescue Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Close combat ensues at the hotel, a machine gun threat emerges, followed by Rosita's rescue and expressions of gratitude.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle Hostage Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, where he becomes involved in a hostage situation and faces betrayal and danger.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Hostage Situation Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat, followed by a briefing about Captain Lawton's son being held hostage for sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration, Observation, and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan infiltrates the jungle, unaware of being observed, leading to an ambush by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and brought before Grauer, facing interrogation and brutal torture to extract the sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Office Fire, Chase, and Native Hut Arson
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is confronted in an office, leading to a chase and a fire that engulfs native huts, with Dolan caught in the blaze.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Confrontation, Chase, and Fire Start
Grauer's Plan and Native Huts Fire
Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush Reveal, Fight, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan reveals himself in a jungle ambush, fights the natives, leading to the chief's accidental death, and a surprising alliance with the natives.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Dilemma, Bar Brawl, and Dolan's Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Onboard a ship, the Captain faces a dilemma, leading to a bar brawl and culminating in Dolan being spanked by the Captain for his actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead
Order Rescinded, Shore Leave, and Dolan's Deed

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Reilly Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the Robert Burgess murder, focusing on Tom Reilly and Farnacci's racketeering.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Story Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the 'Twinkle Twins' story, setting up their roles as adventurous detectives fighting ruthless killers.

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Briefing and Police Headquarters Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are briefed on the Robert Burgess murder case at the newspaper office and decide to investigate at police headquarters.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on the Reilly Case
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Miss Reilly's Condition
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane visit the hospital, find Miss Reilly, and discover she is critically ill and needs a rare blood type.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly
Encounter with the Sick Miss Reilly
Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci Connection and Newspaper Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Diane recognizes Farnacci as a racketeer, they contact Elijah, and newspaper revelations confirm Farnacci's gang's involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Tom Reilly and Murphy's Confession
sub_scenes.description: The Twins decide to search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, leading them to Mrs. Murphy, who reveals Farnacci's deal to take the blame.

narrative_arcs.title: Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly
Continuing the Search and Hearing Whispers
Meeting Mrs. Murphy and the Confession

sub_scenes.title: Mob Threat, Ambush, and Dan's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Murphy expresses fear of Farnacci's mob, leading to an ambush and Dan pursuing the shooters.

narrative_arcs.title: Farnacci's Mob Threat and Mr. Murphy's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Shooter Apprehension, Hospital Emergency, and Blood Appeal
sub_scenes.description: Police apprehend the shooters, the injured are rushed to the hospital, and a community blood appeal is initiated for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Lassie Reilly's Birthday
sub_scenes.description: Planning for Farnacci's arrest, police raid and apprehension at the poolroom, and finally, a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly marking a happy resolution.
